Title: Enacts the "farm equipment fair repair act"
Summary: Requires original manufacturers of agricultural equipment to make certain documentation, parts, and tools required for the diagnosis, maintenance, or repair of agricultural equipment available, on fair and reasonable terms, to independent repair providers and owners of agricultural equipment manufactured and sold on or after July 1, 2015.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "farm equipment fair repair act"
